text:
Title of Project: Emotion recognition.

Debrief form

Researchers: Dr Anthony Haffey
contact: a.haffey@reading.ac.uk
University of Reading


Thank you for participating in this study.

In this project we were interested in your personality traits and how you responded to some some emotion recognition tasks. In particular, we were interested in whether your personality traits would predict whether you would be more accurate or less accurate.


This application has been reviewed by the University Research Ethics Committee and has been given a favourable ethical opinion for conduct

Thank you,

Project Supervisor: Anthony Haffey

Module convenor: Eugene McSorley (e.mcsorley@reading.ac.uk)
I understand these instructions and am happy for my data to be used in this study
